name: rjwtoolapi
SQLP01_RJWData: Data Source=RJWCHI-SQLP01; Initial Catalog=RJWData;User ID=RJWAPI;Password=*2017*APILogin; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;

accountMessages: User Name or Password Is Incorrect
User Account is Locked, Please Contact MIS.
The user : {0} is not authorized to access the {1}.

ConfigRetailLink.loadExistQuery: SELECT cast(LOADNO as INT) AS LOADNO,  substring(SHIPTONAME, PatIndex('%[0-9]%', SHIPTONAME), len(SHIPTONAME)) AS SHIPTOCODE ,CAST(COUNT(ORDERID) AS INT) AS CNT FROM OPENQUERY(SYNAPSE_DB_PROD, 'SELECT OHDR.ORDERID,NVL(CON.NAME,OHDR.SHIPTONAME) SHIPTONAME ,OHDR.SHIPTO,LOADNO FROM ALPS.ORDERHDR OHDR JOIN CONSIGNEE CON ON CON.CONSIGNEE=OHDR.SHIPTO WHERE OHDR.LOADNO = ''{0}'' AND ORDERSTATUS<>''X'' ') GROUP BY LOADNO,substring(SHIPTONAME, PatIndex('%[0-9]%', SHIPTONAME), len(SHIPTONAME))
ConfigRetailLink.mainQuery: SELECT PO, POLINES, CASECOUNT, Case when  cast(WEIGHTORDER as decimal(16,2))<1 then 1 else  cast(WEIGHTORDER as decimal(16,2)) end as WEIGHTORDER, ISNULL(BOL, '') BOL, PRO, LoadType FROM OPENQUERY(SYNAPSE_DB_PROD,'SELECT OHDR.PO, 1 as POLINES, SUM(ODTL.CASECOUNT) AS CASECOUNT, cast(SUM(OHDR.WEIGHTORDER) as decimal(16,8)) AS WEIGHTORDER, OHDR.CUSTID, OHDR.ORDERID AS OO, '' '' AS BOL, OHDR.TMS_SHIPMENT_ID AS PRO, 1 as LoadType FROM ALPS.ORDERHDR OHDR INNER JOIN (SELECT ORDERID, SHIPID, SUM(CASE UOM WHEN ''CS'' THEN NVL(QTYORDER,0) WHEN ''PLT'' THEN NVL(QTYORDER,0) ELSE 0 END) CASECOUNT FROM ALPS.ORDERDTL WHERE LINESTATUS <>''X'' GROUP BY ORDERID, SHIPID) ODTL ON OHDR.ORDERID=ODTL.ORDERID AND OHDR.SHIPID=ODTL.SHIPID WHERE OHDR.LOADNO in ({0}) GROUP BY OHDR.TMS_SHIPMENT_ID, OHDR.PO,OHDR.ORDERID,OHDR.CUSTID ORDER BY OHDR.ORDERID,OHDR.CUSTID')

errorLogTables: SELECT dtstamp, ErrorString FROM RJWData..tblProcessErrorLog (NOLOCK) WHERE ProcessName='Auto Consolidation' AND ErrorString LIKE '%{0}%' AND dtstamp>ISNULL((SELECT MAX(dtstamp) FROM RJWData..tblWMSAutoConsolidateLog (NOLOCK) WHERE WMSLoadNo='{0}'),'1/1/1900')

SELECT TOP 1 MAX(dtstamp) dtstamp, ErrorString FROM RJWData..tblProcessErrorLog (NOLOCK) WHERE ProcessName Like 'Merge Loads Consolidation' AND ErrorString LIKE '%{0}%' AND dtstamp>ISNULL((SELECT MAX(dtstamp) FROM RJWData..[tblWMSAutoMergeLoadsConsolidateLog] (NOLOCK) WHERE WMSLoadNo in('{1}')),'1/1/1900') GROUP BY ERRORSTRING
successLogTables: SELECT dtstamp, TMWMove FROM RJWData..tblWMSAutoConsolidateLog (NOLOCK) WHERE WMSLoadNo='{0}'
select DISTINCT dtstamp, TMWMove from RJWDATA..[tblWMSAutoMergeLoadsConsolidateLog] where wmsloadno in ('{0}')
